description:
A boy climbs a beanstalk to heaven.  A man promises to marry his dying wife when she is reborn.  The sorrowful souls of dead mothers haunt a mountain for all eternity.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mame no Tsuru to Ten no Yakata / Otei no Hanashi / Moyabune
The Beanstalk and the Heavenly Mansion / Otei`s Story / Moyabune
豆のつると天の館 / お貞のはなし / もや船
